text: George Robert Williams (18 November 1932 – March 2003) was an English professional footballer who played as a right half. ==Career== Born in Felling, Williams spent his early career with Rotherham United, Sheffield United and Wisbech Town. He signed for Bradford City from Wisbech Town in June 1956.Frost, p. 410 He made 6 league appearances for the club,Frost, p. 390 before moving to Mansfield Town in July 1957. ==Sources== * ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2003 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Rotherham United F.C. players Category:Sheffield United F.C. players Category:Wisbech Town F.C. players Category:Bradford City A.F.C. players Category:Mansfield Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football wing halves
title: Robert Williams (footballer, born 1932)
